feed.title: MeshCentral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.42
entry.content:
• b949cecc Version 1.1.42
  • c7cbf2f1 Updated Windows x86-32 and 64 agents.
  • d49afdd7 report version/size correctly to control panel #6860

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.43
entry.content:
• 23bee3b9 Added MeshCmd back
  • a2a1db39 Version 1.1.43
  • b8168530 bump semver to 7.7.1 (#6911)
  • 46e6ddb8 upgrade otplib to 12.0.1 #6912
  • 59204bc3 bump pg npm module to 8.14.1 (#6914)
  • af8947e4 add Client Hints for browser detection #6899
  • 7daadfe3 update translations #6898
  • 2337013a cira connected instead of cira detected
  • 126c8856 fix amt/cira browser notification wrong way round
  • ce417aa1 forgot consentMessages descriptions
  • 0fd4dae0 fix getDeviceDetails for 3rd party libraries
  • bc3f9ed8 forgot newAccountsRights in schema
  • 027e5b52 add descriptions to schema and fix sample-config-advanced.json
  • 5cb565c0 Update meshcentral-config-schema.json (#6897)
  • 7a33270e Allow allowedOrigin to be configured on container startup (#6894)
  • 1cecf84b add riscv64 agent
  • b34d314c fix seconds calculation in web ui #6893
  • 0d346b1d delete temp file when download is redirected (#6877)
  • 1f83b792 fix duo 2fa failing to add #2432
  • 88a765bb add agentupdate to console agent actions #6869
  • 7ad4b917 print stack trace on plugin error and add space for readability of error message (#6859)
  • d10173a0 fix sharing-mobile view only having control #6764
  • 0e3a6b49 fix logoutOnIdleSessionTimeout spelling and extra translations #6851

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.44
entry.content:
• 8fa54324 Version 1.1.44
  • d0f99cb4 Code sign MeshCentralRouter + Translations
  • 5b974e82 externalsignjob - External Code Signing Job (#6977)
  • 11ae3775 add user locked key to list view #6985
  • c6928846 dont log amt wsman end events
  • 134ca4f0 fix rsakeysize for letsencrypt #6988
  • b7364d89 disable network for lshw to fix vmware workstation bug on ubuntu 24
  • 4be31f55 Clarify AgentConfig in Traefik guide (#6984)
  • 95e17968 use minversion tlsv1 to fix older amt issues (#6983)
  • f029abb1 dont log amt wsman events and fix start/end times in recordings
  • 1cd2bb26 fix start and end times for recordings
  • b75f96cb fix duo with csp and chrome/edge
  • 2b1129fb fix batch tags dialogue box #6971
  • 1902e5ae change time range to 2 seperate boxes #6947
  • f4b17909 add forgotten err object check for fs.unlink (#6972)
  • b0b0f0c2 apply assistantTypeAgentInvite to email invites too #6970
  • c2492825 add amt relay events and fixamt recordings #6652
  • 41d92416 fix messager recordings/events/downloads
  • ea692073 forgot minify for amt local session recording changes
  • def7d737 change local recording for amt from 200 to 102 to avoid messenger conflict
  • 440cad5b runcommands now shows live output in console instead of after finishing #6948
  • 5f68458c Add flags to meshes to prefer agentname when synced and to override synced name temporarily (#6809)
  • c202339b Add mongodump args option (#6921)
  • 42d02fdb add meshgroup to relay groups for clarification #6949
  • e238aaec dont compress devicefile.ashx to show file sizes
  • 918e889b maybe fix Backuppathtestfile can't be deleted #6965
  • 08430a5f add missing login events to duo and pushlogin
  • 640a874a fix riscv64 in ‘meshinstall.sh’.sh
  • 17aff905 fix failed 2fa port undefined in authlog
  • fee02a17 fix 2fa modal issues in modern ui #6925
  • 36b5af7a seperate intel amt + amt cira in serverstats and monitoring #6549

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.45
entry.content:
• 199bb7ae Version 1.1.45
  • a8ed3464 forgot duo and push notifications for force2factor #7045
  • 45ec1998 fix autoAcceptOnTimeout with oldStyle #7036
  • fc32e1c2 refix placeholder {0}{1} #7037
  • 4afe0fe3 fix ~users in active sessions popup #7044
  • 158107d6 add sessionrecordings for powershell/user shells #7035
  • b97caabc upgrade image-size to 2.0.2
  • 022f85ef fix consent/notify messages with multiple placeholders #7037
  • 4fc921c1 upgrade mongodb+image-size, fix package installs again, stop docker installing translate packages
  • b64b1436 oops forget codecertname includes extra data at the end #6999
  • 0feaec0d generate new codesign-cert if cert value changes #6999
  • db282b22 fix android agentinvite mobile ui #7032
  • 14b0882b more german translations #7023
  • 3b0a1bc2 few more translations #7023
  • 5e031aaa fix attemptCleanCertsSync function for non tls amt
  • f1c1e3bf fix zh-cht/zh-chs wrong way round #7026
  • 001cdd1a fix Chinese Simplified/Traditional in web ui for now #7026
  • fa7f194e fix amt notls always using tls, fix tls undefined, amt timeout shortened, commander typo fix
  • d9f2f869 fix older amt devices with custom amt certificates #6565
  • 9cfe44a4 refix #7003 used wrong variable
  • bfa9dace Update SECURITY.md
  • 665a78d5 tiny translate fix
  • 9699e9b4 fix connectivity crashing serverstats #7003
  • 0ee73bd9 fix long usernames in list view #6997

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.46
entry.content:
• 0aaab322 Version 1.1.46
  • f2bb94c8 allow dns names in userallowedip,userblockedip,agentallowedip,agentblockedip #5089
  • 3e07d92e add translations for Connection Details in meshagent #4944
  • 7ad49ba0 fix modern ui fullscreen toolbar #6874
  • 92c2b613 disable compression by default and dont compress webrelays #4369
  • e47626a6 fixed minify problem with new library #7107
  • 64679479 Bump brace-expansion from 2.0.1 to 2.0.2 (#7101)
  • 28aa2710 few ipv6 fixes in web ui
  • fb7940b2 revert getDeviceDetails commits as was external problem
  • 9bc2b3f4 forgot to fix meshctrl for json output from getDeviceDetails
  • cadc0d03 fix webrelay not creating new tunnels #7113
  • c6d84287 fix amt json import naming bug
  • 80945174 fix run commands switcher in modern ui #7097
  • 95759d40 fix webrelay timeouting too fast #7102
  • 2b4ab2b1 fix getDeviceDetails json stringify problem #7103
  • 1d7d68cd final attempt at stale.yml
  • d21d7ab9 Update stale.yml
  • 960326ab remove semver dependency for plugins
  • 8588fe24 fix stale bot
  • b3f3d658 Changed sqldump errortext (#7098)
  • b1876f0f few more docker clean ups to make smaller size
  • ec3e06e3 WebDAV: update to v5 (#6780)
  • fa75a96a Ukrainian localization fixes (#7092)
  • 108a297b speed up docker build github actions
  • 5044339c Docker hotfix for npm modules (#7075)
  • 28b31b24 use html-minifier-terser instead for translate and fix translate multi-threaded
  • 809e6e6e Remove broken link
  • a2a9939a remove matrix, ran out of memory?
  • bb587633 try github actions matrix to improve speed
  • 653074c5 restore old docker workflow for now
  • 8f708206 forgot permissions for actions
  • 1ea043a9 repository_owner not actor for docker workflow, doh!
  • cd30e13a remove token_check, use github_token and add annotations to docker workflows
  • 6f5f5325 introducing stalebot to help clean up old issues
  • 31e4ebe8 undo test line change
  • 62020e1c fix docker package reinstalls
  • d533cc37 Dockerfix (#7074)
  • da3c4ad7 fix last seen ordering #7073
  • 1009f747 Docker image rewrite
  • ae0aa7e9 Merge branch 'master' into dockerrewrite
  • 5ef5e9ce send 404 with expired/not yet valid sharing links #7062
  • cf183cfd update packages in docker image
  • 3b2aaccf remove console.log doh! #6634
  • 89238303 allow system variables in footer, loginfooter, welcometext, title2 #6634
  • 5fcffcd6 fix email/sms/messaging customised templates #6994
  • 620df540 Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into dockerrewrite
  • 1399ce35 forgot 2 extra otpduo to clear!
  • 3d57a25e add connectivity filtering #7009
  • d98f41ad fix browser fullscreen context menus #7046
  • 12c5908a forgot to also remove sweetalert2.min.css #7050
  • ab17a585 remove sweetalert2 as we dont use it #7050
  • 6bb6b186 Added mysql dependency
  • 933b37f3 Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into dockerrewrite
  • 5d18a1ad Added default exposure of non-encrypted http port.
  • 5223cbd6 removed possible unwanted references
  • f17b96bc Commented out docker scout
  • 6eacc9f3 Merge branch 'master' into dockerrewrite
  • 5d47415e added npm install and removed saslprep dependency.
  • d8647894 bump version
  • 59ca8b08 Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into dockerrewrite
  • 39395c9a Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into dockerrewrite
  • b7512b9b Disable dynamic config feature by default.
  • 8c5c3193 Pinning to Alpine 3.21
  • 0514f4a8 Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into dockerrewrite
  • 5f306a23 include_mongodb_tools fix in workflow.
  • 4cd91966 case insensitivity hotfix.
  • 90b2a3df Add other volumes to readme.
  • 8b2dcf4d Removed case sensitivity in true/false prompts
  • ecd32fa6 Pinning LTS version.
  • 23c8c499 Compression of build arguments and environment variables.
  • 17a36325 Also for the docker compose
  • 9464c1b0 Change example values

  • ea1b71ed Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into dockerrewrite
  • 6008767f Wrong variable.
  • 75df7b86 added "true" to the all option for trusted_proxy env variable.
  • e3636c04 Merge pull request #2 from DaanSelen/master
  • 9e6b98a0 Made names consistent
  • db7eacbc Added trustedproxy to dynamic config feature.
  • 910f12c2 Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into master
  • 39e5691c Make qemu ready.
  • c5a22861 More platforms supported.
  • 1e897ee4 Added support for psql mariadb. Added docker scout action.

  • 162b372b Move preinstall libs to top.

  • 660312ef Working prototype and clear and easy to understand logic.
  • 59194abc More work done on the logic. mongoDB url editing works.

  • 86ecc426 @DaanSelen Docker overhaul intermediate commit.
  • 5594b15d Merge branch 'Ylianst:master' into master
